definition: to split up/to break all ties
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: If you want to walk out of here, you'll go through me, you got it?
sentences.chinese: 你若從這走出去，你我就此恩斷義絕，你聽懂了嗎？
